name: Arena Manager (duttongames)
description:
Featuring Art by Andrew 'Nutter' Jaggar. Welcome to Arena Manager! Hire Gladiators, capture monsters, and pit them against each other in the Arena for gold! How fast can you earn 30,000 gold? Made for GiTD(Game in Ten Days) #107. The theme was "Resource Management".

https://discourse.shortbits.io/t/gitd-107-theme-reveal-discussion-entries/39
